title: Roses and Bones: Myths, Tales, and Secrets
description: What happens when a girl finds herself at the crossroads between worldsâ€”where the angels and ghosts, gods and demons, and beauties and beasts of myth are real? What does she do and who does she become?Roses and Bones captures the best Francesca Lia Block has to offer: extravagantly imaginative tales, dark landscapes, fierce poetry, and storytelling that is nothing short of magical.
author: Francesca Lia Block
